1677160.name: Simona's Requiem Soundtrack
1677160.description:
Team Simona's composer Alex Mutegeki brings you the official soundtrack for Simona's Requiem. The music captures the sound of the strange and varied lands Simona travels through on their journey.

Pumping Electronic vibes, somber piano tunes and swelling themes covers the whole spectrum in this eclectic album.

Features four previously unreleased tracks that were not included in the game.
